[[Image:GoT Season 1 back cover.jpg|thumb|right|250px|The rear cover and tracklisting for the Season 1 soundtrack.]]
The '''Game of Thrones Season 1 Soundtrack''' was composed by [[Ramin Djawadi]] and was released on June 28, 2011. It was followed by the ''[[Game of Thrones Season 2 Soundtrack]]'', released in 2012.
